channel.title: Discord Blog
channel.description: Learn about Discord's updates, insights, community stories, educational resources, and much more.

item.title: Discord Developers, Here‚Äôs to 2023 and What‚Äôs to Come!
item.description: As we bid farewell to 2023, let‚Äôs reflect on the incredible journey we‚Äôve had together in the world of developing on Discord.

item.title: 5 Holiday Gift Ideas for your Discord Friends
item.description: We‚Äôve got a handful of Discord-themed gift ideas that you can give others for the Holidays ‚Äî or any time of the year!

item.title: Discord Update: December 13, 2023 Changelog
item.description: Here's the Discord Changelog from December 13, 2023 so you can stay in-the-know about what‚Äôs new in recent app updates!

item.title: How Discord Modernized MFA with WebAuthn
item.description: WebAuthn has landed in Discord for all users! In this post, we‚Äôll talk about the engineering challenges we faced introducing WebAuthn to Discord and how we overcame them.

item.title: pytest daemon: 10X Local Test Iteration Speed
item.description: At Discord, we utilize a Python monolith to power our API. But recently, it took a whopping 13 seconds to run a single test! Join engineer Ruby Feinstein as he tackles this situation and makes the process better for everyone on his team.

item.title: Improving Our Mobile Experience
item.description: Starting today, ‚ÄúDiscord but smol‚Äù gets a fresh set of updates for touch input on the screen that fits in your pocket. Check out everything that‚Äôs rolling out to your phone!

item.title: The DDevs Server Celebrates 250k Members!
item.description: The official Discord Developers server reached an incredible milestone of over 250,000 community members! üéâ

item.title: Complete Your Look in the Shop, Now Open to All
item.description: Starting soon, everyone will be able to make purchases from the Shop and start their collection of Avatar Decorations and Profile Effects! Read on to learn how to Shop! üõçÔ∏è

item.title: Ways to Customize Your Discord Experience
item.description: Tailor your forward-facing presence or spruce up the app itself, there are plenty of ways to make Discord yours.

item.title: Apps on Discord to Uplevel Your Competitive Gaming Skills
item.description: We, at Discord, like video games. You probably do, too! In this article, we‚Äôre sharing four apps that bring a bit of competitive spirit to you and your friends.

item.title: 25% or 6 to 4: The 11/6/23 Authentication Outage
item.description: On November 6th, 2023, Discord‚Äôs authentication service went down for approximately 50 minutes, preventing users from using much of Discord. Here's what happened.

item.title: Congrats to the Discord App Pitches 2023 Finalists!
item.description: Between September 26 and October 10, 2023, the Discord Developer community pitched their ideas for a chance to receive up to $15,000 in funding. See the finalists in this blog post!

item.title: @Everyone‚Äôs a Member: Get Two Weeks of Nitro on Us
item.description: Between November 6th and November 13th, 2023, anyone who‚Äôs not currently a Nitro member can try it for 2 weeks on us! You‚Äôre about to see way more decked-out profiles and Super Reactions in your chats.

item.title: 9 Tips for Hanging Out on Discord
item.description: Looking to get more organized, or quiet your notifications to better focus on your conversations? Here are nine things that can make hanging out with friends on Discord easier.

item.title: Scariest Games to Play and Stream with Your Friends on Discord
item.description: Today, we‚Äôre sharing a handful of horror games that work great for using Discord Voice with and stream-worthy frights for your friends to watch.

item.title: Maxjourney: Pushing Discord‚Äôs Limits with a Million+ Online Users in a Single Server
item.description: In this post, we‚Äôll talk about some of the ways we‚Äôve scaled individual Discord servers from tens of thousands of concurrent users to approaching two million concurrent users in the past few years.

item.title: Developers on Discord: Enjoy Premium App Subscriptions and more!
item.description: Today, we‚Äôre announcing the ability for eligible US, EU, and UK-based app developers to monetize their Discord Apps natively on the platform with Premium App Subscriptions.

item.description: Today, we‚Äôre announcing new and upcoming features that make Discord even more fun and easier to use.

item.description: What happens when the ghosts gather on Discord? New ringtones, eerie plushies, and terrifying Activity updates. Read on to see what‚Äôs in store!

item.title: Avatar Decorations & Profile Effects: Collect and Keep the Newest Styles
item.description: Starting today, Nitro members get early access to the Shop, full of stylish avatar decorations and profile effects to add some good ol‚Äô razzle-dazzle to their profiles.

item.title: Supporting Youth Mental Health: Discord's Partnership with Crisis Text Line
item.description: Discord‚Äôs Mental Health Policy Manager walks us through what the Crisis Text Line is, what they do, and how their staff offers support to anyone who may need it.

item.title: Gen Z Mental Health: Empowering Conversation in an Uncertain World
item.description: There's a profound link between human connection and well-being. For Gen Z, this need for connection takes shape both online and in person.

item.description: Today, we‚Äôre stoked to announce the ability to Stream to Discord is coming to Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One consoles soon! Read on to learn how using Stream to Discord on your Xbox will work.

item.description: Dust off your backpack and hit the campus library! To celebrate Back to School, check out Discord's best study features, apps, and Activities.

item.title: Encryption for Voice and Video on Discord
item.description: At Discord, user privacy has always been one of our highest values and priorities. To support this, we‚Äôre starting to experiment with new encryption protocols for voice and video calls. Read on to learn more.

item.title: Get a Month of Discord Nitro On Us During Summer BOGO
item.description: From July 25th, 2023 to August 1st, 2023, new and returning users who buy either a monthly or yearly Discord Nitro membership will receive an additional month of Nitro for free.

item.description: We‚Äôre sending out a message of appreciation for Artificial Intelligence! Today, we‚Äôre highlighting some amazing AI-powered apps from our creative developer community.

item.description: Discord's Family Center is a new opt-in tool that makes it easy for teens to keep their parents and guardians informed about their Discord activity while respecting their autonomy.

item.description: Between May 15‚ÄìJune 15, we celebrated our eighth Discord birthday! Enjoy free Activities, new merch, special Nitro perks, and more.

item.description: Discord usernames are changing to remove four-digit discriminators. Display Names are being added so how you appear to other users stays the same. Read on for more info.
